values.privacy: Protects individual data rights and privacy
values.access: Enables government or law enforcement data access
values.localization: Requires data to be stored within jurisdiction
values.security: National security framework without direct data access provisions
values.sector: Regulates specific sector (AI, telecom, finance, etc.)

government_access.description: Level of government access to data enabled by the law

values.broad: Bulk collection, minimal oversight, backdoor requirements, or extraterritorial compulsion
values.targeted: Access with warrants or court orders for specific investigations
values.limited: Strong procedural safeguards, narrow scope, independent oversight
values.none: No government access provisions in this law

data_protection.description: Level of individual data protection provided

values.strong: Comprehensive rights (access, erasure, portability), strong enforcement, independent DPA
values.moderate: Some protections but with significant exceptions or weaker enforcement
values.weak: Limited rights or broad government/national security exemptions

extraterritorial.description: Whether the law claims jurisdiction beyond the country's borders

requires_localization.description: Whether the law requires data to be stored within the jurisdiction

requires_backdoor.description: Whether authorities can compel decryption, backdoor access, or technical assistance
